title: Orchid
description: Orchid is the debut studio album by Swedish progressive metal band Opeth

title: Morningrise
description: Morningrise showcases Opeth's signature style, exploring the dynamics between the combination of black metal and death metal vocals, and guitar parts with lighter progressive and acoustic elements.

title: My Arms, Your Hearse
description: It was the band's first album to be released simultaneously in Europe, through Candlelight Records, and in the United States, through Century Black.

title: Blackwater Park
description: Although Blackwater Park did not chart in North America or the United Kingdom, it was a commercial breakthrough for the band and is often considered their magnum opus.

title: Ghost Reveries
description: The album marks a temporary return to the progressive metal styles of the previous albums and features death growls, though still includes some of the progressive rock elements of Damnation.
